trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous operation to open a stream for writing to the blob.
trans-unit.target: Ends an asynchronous operation to open a stream for writing to the blob.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.IAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the pending asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobStream</codeEntityReference> to be used for writing to the blob.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.CloudBlobStream</codeEntityReference> to be used for writing to the blob.
